Fast & Easy Consumption Analytics

Track usage, spot variances, identify top moving products or dead stock.

Detailed Stock Reporting

  • Analyse a period between any stocktakes
  • Category based overview helps you to see the big-picture
  • Dig in by searching, filtering or sorting your data
  • See usage, opening and closing stock level for each product with full purchase history

Bird's-eye View

  • Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) is broken down by categories
  • Enter your sales data to get valuable insights
  • See Gross Profit and GP percentages
  • Share your reports with anyone in your organisation

Create Variance Reports

  • Enter your sales data to get valuable insights
  • Spot over-pouring or missing products
  • Get the actual cost of your sales for each product
  • Share your reports with anyone in your organisation
